line.comment: * 0 = Sort by Date Created. (first to top)

line.text: 'Для перехода к Менеджеру Форпоста, кликните по любой строке'

line.comment: * Top right of Outposts screen shows "You hae 10 Outposts."
* Ok, this gets called when you click on an item. This is the call-back, which in turn calls Menui.DWM with parameters to navigate the player somewhere.
* Use clicked "Sort" line, so we change the sort order, and do not navigate anywhere.
* MordanB - Add section to allow Sorting of the list.
* These are the Outpost lists, each is a section of it's own.
* Herobetty 5.2: Extra support perk gives +2 support.
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $backlog.f, alignment= -1, colour= 1, column width= 400

sval.val: Для перехода к Менеджеру Форпоста, кликните по любой строке
0 = Sort by Date Created. (first to top)
Top right of Outposts screen shows "You hae 10 Outposts."
Ok, this gets called when you click on an item. This is the call-back, which in turn calls Menui.DWM with parameters to navigate the player somewhere.
Use clicked "Sort" line, so we change the sort order, and do not navigate anywhere.
MordanB - Add section to allow Sorting of the list.
These are the Outpost lists, each is a section of it's own.
Herobetty 5.2: Extra support perk gives +2 support.
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $backlog.f, alignment= -1, colour= 1, column width= 400
